Description: Describes the columns of the listing of BIDS datasets. The Format of each column is described as python type. The content of the .bidsignore file is not taken into account.

created_on.Description: Date of the first commit of the datalad dataset.
created_on.Assumptions: The dataset ay have been created or acquired long before it was turned into a datalad dataset.

nb_subjects.Description: Number of 'sub-*' folders in the datasets.
nb_subjects.Assumptions: Folders containng only non valid BIDS files will still be listed.

has_participant_tsv.Description: Whether the dataset has a 'participant.tsv' file.

has_participant_json.Description: Whether the dataset has a 'participant.json' file.

participant_columns.Description: Name of eaxh column in  the participant.tsv

nb_sessions_tsv.Description: Total number of '*sessions.tsv' files in the dataset.

nb_scans_tsv.Description: Total number of '*scans.tsv' files in the dataset.

nb_physio_files.Description: Total number of '*physio.tsv.gz' files in the dataset.
nb_physio_files.Assumptions: Does not check if the name of files are BIDS valid.

nb_stim_files.Description: Total number of '*stim.tsv.gz' files in the dataset.
nb_stim_files.Assumptions: Does not check if the name of files are BIDS valid.

has_phenotype_dir.Description: Whether the dataset has a 'phenotype' folder.

has_stimuli_dir.Description: Whether the dataset has a 'stmuli' folder.

eeg_file_formats.Description: Total number of EEG files of each BIDS supported file format.
eeg_file_formats.Assumptions: Does not check if the name of files are BIDS valid.

ieeg_file_formats.Description: Total number of iEEG files of each BIDS supported file format.
ieeg_file_formats.Format: TypedDict('IeegFileFormat', {'nwb': str, 'edf': int, 'eeg': int, 'set': int, 'medf': int})
ieeg_file_formats.Assumptions: Does not check if the name of files are BIDS valid.

meg_file_formats.Description: Total number of MEG files of each BIDS supported file format.
meg_file_formats.Assumptions: Does not check if the name of files are BIDS valid.

nb_meeg_channels.Description: Number of channels EEG, iEEG or MEG channels. Read from the header where possible.
nb_meeg_channels.Assumptions: Based on data from the first participant only.

datatypes.Description: List of BIDS supported datatypes found in the dataset.
datatypes.Assumptions: The datatype will be listed even if it occurs only in a single subject.

sessions.Assumptions: A sessions name will be listed even if it occurs only once for a single subject. The session <ill be listed even if it contains 0 valid BIDS file in it.

tasks.Description: List of the tasks names present in the dataset a they appear in filenames.
tasks.Assumptions: A sessions name will be listed even if it occurs only once for a single subject. The task be will be listed even if it comes from a file BIDS invalid filename.

size.Description: Size of the whole dataset as reported by 'datalad stattus -annex all'
size.Assumptions: This includes all BIDS invalid files and the content of the derivatives, sourcedata folders. So likely to be an overestiamtion.

license.Description: Name of the license of the dataset.

authors.Description: List of the authors as reported in the dataset_description

institutions.Description: List of the unique institutions founn in the InstitutionName and InstitutionAddress of the JSON sidecars.
institutions.Assumptions: Based on the JSON sidecars of the first participant only.

duration.Description: Duration in seconds of each run for the first participant of the dataset. Listing is done by datatypes and where possible split further by task.
duration.Assumptions: Examping to the whole dataset assumes that all participants followed the same protocol as the first subject.

references_and_links.Description: List of the authors as reported in the dataset_description

raw.Description: Link datalad sibling of the raw dataset.

fmriprep.Description: Link datalad sibling of the fmiprep dataset in the derivatives folder or on OpenneuroDerivatives. Empty if it does not exist.

mriqc.Description: Link datalad sibling of the mriqc dataset in the derivatives folder or on OpenneuroDerivatives.
